labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Discord Overlay shows in Top-Right corner, all keyboard input to the game will not work. Alt-Tab and Alt-F4 work.
data.expected_result: Discord Overlay should work as intended using the hotkeys and seeing any Discord users in voice chat.
data.short_description: Discord In-game Overlay disables keyboard input in Battlefield 4
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable Discord in-game Overlay (Stable or Canary) - Join any Battlefield 4 server - Attempt to use any keys such as Enter or Escape
